a.title: Continuous Learning Grading Plan
a.br: High School Continuous Learning Grading Plan

h1.span:
Students will be able to retrieve belongings from the gym and bring in any school equipment/uniforms they have on Tuesday, April 14th and Wednesday, April 15th between 8 am and 12 pm.
Jal Jr/Sr High students: if you need to leave a positive comment, please come by the high school Monday through Thursday, from 8 to 12. I have sidewalk chalk and would like you to express yourself on Property Street. Remember social distancing but this can serve as an outlet for you!!! Send messages to your friends, positive thoughts, and support for each other.
Parents: Click here to answer our Household Needs questionnaire. This questionnaire is required and allows us to understand the needs of each student for continuous learning from home.

Students personal items will be available for pickup starting Monday, April 6th at 8:00 a.m. in the offices of both schools. Items will be placed in bags and brought up to the students. No more than 5 students will be allowed in the office areas at one time.
We will have resources and instructional materials available on our website starting Monday, April 6th.

Estudiantes de Jal Jr / Sr High: si necesita dejar un comentario positivo, venga a la escuela secundaria de lunes a jueves de 8 a 12. Tengo tiza en la acera y me gustaría que se exprese en Property Street. ¡Recuerde el distanciamiento social, pero esto puede servirle como una salida para usted! Envíe mensajes a sus amigos, pensamientos positivos y apoyo mutuo.
Padres: Haga clic aquí para responder a nuestro cuestionario de necesidades del hogar. Este cuestionario es obligatorio y nos permite comprender las necesidades de cada alumno para el aprendizaje continuo desde el hogar.
Los artículos personales de los estudiantes estarán disponibles para su recogida a partir del lunes 6 de abril a las 8:00 a.m. en las oficinas de ambas escuelas. Los artículos serán colocados en bolsas y entregados a los estudiantes. No se permitirán más de 5 estudiantes en las áreas de oficina a la vez.
Tendremos recursos y materiales de instrucción disponibles en nuestro sitio web a partir del lunes 6 de abril.
​​​​
Bus Safety Guidelines
Mission/Vision Statement:
The core purpose of Jal Public Schools is to establish a community of engaged 21st century learners and learning through relationships, relevance, and rigor one student at a time.
"Learning for all, whatever it takes"
